==== Ubuntu Women Project ====

* Team Meeting <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20121009|October 9th]]</nowiki>
* Hosted fifth Career Days session, this time with Silvia Bindelli (Dolasilla) on being a Software Release Coordinator
** <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2012-October/003631.html]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/CareerDays/SoftwareReleaseCoordinator]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/issue-66/|Full Circle Magazine, Issue #66]]</nowiki> with an article from Flavia and Silvia about their work in Ubuntu, new leadership positions within our project and project goals
* Flavia Weisghizzi ran an Ubuntu Women session for <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuOpenWeek/quantal/Timetable|Ubuntu Open Week for Quantal]]</nowiki>,  <nowiki>[[http://irclogs.ubuntu.com/2012/10/25/%23ubuntu-classroom.html#t16:00|logs]]</nowiki>
* Ubuntu Women at the Ubuntu Developer Summit (UDS)
** <nowiki>[[http://blog.ubuntu-women.org/2012/11/ubuntu-women-at-uds-r/|Blog post]]</nowiki>
** Flavia Weisghizzi and Na'Tosha Bard planned Ubuntu Women dinner
** Photos <nowiki>[[http://www.flickr.com/photos/pleia2/8152538732/|here]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/photos/107475171872178189740/albums/5807004528894832129?banner=pwa&authkey=CIvs7aSG-o7algE|here]]</nowiki>
** Elizabeth Krumbach and Flavia Weisghizzi ran Ubuntu Women Session
** <nowiki>[[http://people.ubuntu.com/~lyz/uds-r/community-r-ubuntu-women-project-goals|Notes]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0mA4B6DnJ1U|Video]]</nowiki> (see 21:00 for beginning)
